title: Microflex 10-754 Daily Defense Disposable Latex Gloves for Cleaning, Food Prep w/Textured Fingertips - Natural
features: VERSATILE SINGLE-USE GLOVES: Ideal for household, residential, commercial, or industrial use, including food processing, laboratory, janitorial, auto, mechanics
TEXTURED FINGERTIPS: Latex gloves feature textured fingertips for excellent grip when handling food, and superb tactile sensitivity for fine equipment or device handling
POWDER-FREE: Durable natural rubber gloves are powder-free, making them a great fit for sensitive skin that needs protection during meal prep, cleaning, or when working in a lab
SMALL SIZE: Comfortable glove fit for palm circumference of 6.5 to 7 inches. Available sizes are small (6.5-7" palm circumference), medium (7.5-8"), large (8.5-9"), and extra large (9.5-10")
INCLUDES: 1 case of 1,000 Daily Defense ambidextrous gloves
description: These powder-free Daily Defense 10-754 disposable gloves can be used for multiple purposes including the food processing, food preparation, and cleaning industries. Featuring latex for protection with a soft and comfortable feel. Daily Defense natural rubber latex gloves help protect against unseen hazards during cleaning of commonly used spaces in the workplace, schools, and other public spaces. In addition to commercial use, these multi-purpose latex gloves are ideal for home use to protect your hands while cleaning, gardening, or cooking. Our light duty disposable gloves feature a beaded cuff and textured fingertips for optimal grip while being used. Available sizes: Small 6.5" to 7" (palm circumference); Medium 7.5" to 8"; Large 8.5" to 9"; X-Large 9.5" to 10" Palm thickness: 0.14mm / 5.5mil Finger thickness: 0.17mm / 6.7mil Applications: Food processing and handling, schools, catering and meal preparation, light assembly tasks, automotive, laboratory analysis, light duty maintenance, dish washing, commercial and business cleaning, pet care and grooming, gardening, residential and home use
